english_translation: If you want more, there is pain, if you say 'enough,' there is joy
Where is the fence for desire in this world?

english_transliteration: Iruvudanu koṭṭu biḍu, ā sukhake nakku biḍu
english_translation: Give away what you have, laugh at that happiness

kannada_original: ನೀ ಸಿದ್ಧ, ನೀ ಬುದ್ಧ ! – ಮುದ್ದು ರಾಮ.
english_transliteration: Nī siddha, nī buddha ! – Muddu Rāma.
english_translation: You are ready, you are awakened! – Dear Rama.
